lead_paragraph: South Africa's bowlers rallied magnificently after the loss of pace spearhead Dale Steyn before their batsmen pushed to an 102-run lead at the close on day two of the first test against Australia on Friday.

headline.print_headline: South Africa Shrug Off Steyn Blow to Lead by 102
headline.main: South Africa Shrug Off Steyn Blow to Lead by 102

snippet: South Africa's bowlers rallied magnificently after the loss of pace spearhead Dale Steyn before their batsmen pushed to an 102-run lead at the close on day two of the first test against Australia on Friday....
